item.title: My Mind
item.description: Introduction Our mind is trapped by our mind. my reminders 2022-10-27 People become defensive when they feel threatened, and I will work to avoid accidentally causing people to feel threatened by me and my words. Restated: if people feel threatened by me, it should be something I do intentionally. 2022-11-12 Many people will think I am crazy when I try to help them if they do not want me to help them.
